landing.title: Choose how to take part
landing.content: Would you like to have a conversation or record yourself?

paths.title: Live interview
paths.content: Book an online meeting with a member of the online research team
items: At a time that suits you

paths.title: Self record
paths.content: Record your responses privately and in your own time
items: Start right away or whenever you like
Read and respond at your leisure
Pause and resume on any device

appointments.title: Book a live interview
appointments.content: Pick from the available dates and times

info.title: What happens next?
info.content: You will receive confirmation and reminder emails. When it's nearly time for your appointment, click the link in your email to enter the meeting room.

questions.text: 1 Please spend a couple of minutes describing your professional experience in the field of obstetrics.
2 Please spend a couple of minutes describing your professional experience in the field of obstetrics.
3 Please spend a couple of minutes describing your professional experience in the field of obstetrics.
4 Please spend a couple of minutes describing your professional experience in the field of obstetrics.
5 Please spend a couple of minutes describing your professional experience in the field of obstetrics.

selectedSlot.title: Choose a fixed start
selectedSlot.content: Appointments have no duration and last as long as you need them to.
selectedSlot.change: You can change or cancel this slot later if you need to.

preSettings.title: All set to begin?
preSettings.content: You can disable your camera using the controls above if you would like to. Access to your microphone is required.

instructions.title: You'll be asked a series of questions
instructions.content: Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo. Macenas faucibus mollis interdum

instructions.title: Mollis ornare vel eu leo
instructions.content: Doloremque tenetur nobis quas optio! Assumenda esse iure, dolorum porro ex eum doloribus itaque fugit soluta architecto quae.

instructions.title: Doloribus itaque fugit soluta architecto
instructions.content: Repellendus suscipit in quam recusandae architecto illum mollitia molestias, excepturi dolore sunt, hic totam ab quod id ut numquam ad quibusdam.

preSettings.title: All set to begin?
preSettings.content: Access to your microphone is required. Video access is encouraged but you can disable your camera using the controls above if you wish.
